restaurantNotUpdated: This restaurant has not updated its status
invalidCredentials: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
registrationFailed: Failed to save user credentials. Please try again.
registrationError: Error during registration. Please check your details and try again.
howItWorksIntro: Welcome to my food ordering platform! Here’s a quick overview of how everything works behind the scenes to ensure a smooth experience:
userManagementDesc: Create an account or log in to access all features. Your account securely stores your information for a personalized experience.
restaurantManagementDesc: Browse through a curated list of restaurants. View detailed menus with prices and descriptions to find exactly what you’re craving.
orderManagementDesc: Add items to your cart from one or multiple restaurants. Keep track of all your ongoing orders simultaneously. After confirming your order, track its status in real-time until completion.
realTimeUpdatesDesc: Using WebSocket technology, we provide live updates on your delivery status, so you always know when your food will arrive.
paymentsDesc: The platform includes a simulated payment system to finalize your orders securely and efficiently.
learningDesc: This project was developed to explore multi-server architectures, real-time systems, and database management. While it’s fully functional, the platform is currently for educational purposes and not active for public use.
aboutIntro: I developed an online food ordering website using
forRealTimeUpdates: for real-time updates on delivery status
aboutServices: The website includes three server-side services:
aboutGoal: The primary goal of the website was to experiment with complex development involving multiple servers.
aboutFeatures: Key features of the site include
featureViewingMenus: Viewing restaurant menus and the list of restaurants
featureMonitoringStatus: Monitoring order status after payment (simulated payment)
aboutLearning: I worked on the project alone to learn and experiment with all aspects of development. I used three
aboutDatabases: databases and didn’t integrate any external tools.
aboutChallenges: The biggest challenge was aggregating data from multiple servers and presenting it as coherent information on the client side.
aboutPersonalUse: The website is for personal use and learning, so it is not active.
hotFreshReady: Hot, fresh, and ready to go – get your meal today!
exploreRestaurants: Explore a wide array of local restaurants with ease.
stayUpdated: Stay updated on your food delivery in real-time.
viewMenus: View detailed menus from your favorite restaurants.
foodLinkIntro: FoodLink connects you to finest restaurants right at your fingertips. Browse through a diverse selection of eateries, explore their menus, and handpick your favorite dishes for a delightful dining experience. Completing your order is a breeze with our easy-to-use platform. Plus, you can track your order online every step of the way.
orderFromBest: Order from the best local restaurants
pleaseLogin: Please log in to order items
